1622870.name: Papetura Soundtrack and Artbook
1622870.description:
Papetura Original Soundtrack

36-minute Papetura Original Soundtrack from acclaimed composer and musician Floex.

01 - Papetura Intro
02 - The Light
03 - Branches
04 - Hollow
05 - In Prison
06 - Cave Pond
07 - The Edge Of Light
08 - Pape And Tura
09 - Chambers
+ 2 Bonus tracks

Papetura Artbook


Artbook contains over hundred sketchbook pages of early ideas, unused concepts, game assets, paper model plans, game design ideas and many more sketches collected over 7 years of game development.

Soundtrack (.mp3+.flac) and Artbook (.pfd) files will be located in your game folder, by default in:
PC: C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Papetura[/i]
Mac: ~/Library/Application Support/Steam/steamapps/common/Papetura
Steam App: Library -> right click the game -> Properties -> Local Files - > Browse Local Files

Full game sold separately.
